text: Robinson Crusoe () is a 1947 Soviet adventure movie directed by Aleksandr Andriyevsky.В "Иллюзионе" стартует фестиваль стереофильмовРобинзон Крузо (1948) The story of the film is based on the 1719 novel Robinson Crusoe by Daniel Defoe. It stars Pavel Kadochnikov, Yuri Lyubimov, and Aleksandr Smiranin. ==Actors== * Pavel Kadochnikov - Robinson Crusoe * Yuri Lyubimov - Friday * Aleksandr Smiranin - Father of Robinson * E.
